title: MCGM Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 123 Pharmacist and Other Posts
description: The Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai (MCGM) has released the official Notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 123 Pharmacists, CDO,  Pest Control Officers, Assistant Jobs, and Other Positions. Candidates who have qualified in B.Pharm, D.Pharm, Any Degree, 10th Pass, B.Tech can apply for these Posts. Here we include the Age Limit, Selection Process, Education details, Salary Structure, Application fee, and how to apply for MCGM Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible cand...
